name: John Doe
message: Wishing John Doe all the best in his future endeavors. Your dedication and hard work have been an inspiration to the entire team. Farewell!

name: Jane Smith
message: Thank you, Jane Smith, for your valuable contributions to the team. Your positive attitude and teamwork will be greatly missed. Best of luck in your new journey!
